name: Percentage of Local Usage
title: PLU
definition: Identifies the percent of local usage associated with trunk groups carrying local traffic between a LEC and a CLEC.
usageNotes: Required when the CC field is populated and the first position of the REQTYP field is “M” and the ACT field is “N”, “C” or “R”.
Optional when the CC field is populated and the first position of the REQTYP field is “S” or “L” and the ACT field is “N”, “C”, “M”, “T” or “R”.
